Search_by_address_txn_hash_block_token_: Search by address / txn hash / block / token...

footer.content: Zenchain explorer is a tool for inspecting and analyzing the Zenchain blockchain.

block_related.The_block_height_of_a_particular_block_i: The block height of a particular block is defined as the number of blocks preceding it in the blockchain
block_related.Size_of_the_block_in_bytes: Size of the block in bytes
block_related.Date_time_at_which_block_was_produced: Date & time at which block was produced
block_related.The_number_of_transactions_in_the_block: The number of transactions in the block
block_related.A_block_producer_who_successfully_includ: A block producer who successfully included the block onto the blockchain
block_related.For_each_block_the_validator_is_rewarded: For each block, the validator is rewarded with a finite amount of ZCX on top of the fees paid for all transactions in the block
block_related.Amount_of_distributed_reward_validators_: Amount of distributed reward. validators receive a static block reward + Tx fees + uncle fees
block_related.The_total_gas_amount_used_in_the_block_a: The total gas amount used in the block and its percentage of gas filled in the block
block_related.Total_gas_limit_provided_by_all_transact: Total gas limit provided by all transactions in the block
block_related.The_minimum_gas_price_a_transaction_shou: The minimum gas price a transaction should have in order to be included in this block
block_related.Minimum_fee_required_per_unit_of_gas_Fee: Minimum fee required per unit of gas. Fee adjusts based on network congestion
block_related.User_defined_tips_sent_to_validator_for_: User-defined tips sent to validator for transaction priority/inclusion
block_related.Block_difficulty_for_validator_used_to_c: Block difficulty for validator, used to calibrate block generation time
block_related.Total_difficulty_of_the_chain_until_this: Total difficulty of the chain until this block
block_related.The_SHA256_hash_of_the_block: The SHA256 hash of the block
block_related.The_hash_of_the_block_from_which_this_bl: The hash of the block from which this block was generated
block_related.Block_nonce_is_a_value_used_during_minin: Block nonce is a value used during mining to demonstrate proof of work for a block

verified_contracts_area.Couldnt_find_any_contract_that_matches_y: Couldn't find any contract that matches your query.

stats_chart.averageTxnFee_description: The average amount in ETH spent per transaction
stats_chart.txnsFee_description: Amount of tokens paid as fees
stats_chart.averageBlockRewards_description: Average amount of distributed reward in tokens per day
stats_chart.averageBlockSize_description: Average size of blocks in bytes
stats_chart.averageGasLimit_description: Average gas limit per block for the period
stats_chart.averageGasPrice_description: Average gas price for the period (Gwei)
stats_chart.gasUsedGrowth_description: Cumulative gas used for the period
stats_chart.contractsGrowth_description: Cumulative number of contracts for the period
stats_chart.newContracts_description: New contracts number for the period
stats_chart.newVerifiedContracts_description: New verified contracts number for the period
stats_chart.verifiedContractsGrowth_description: Cumulative number verified contracts for the period

stats_counter.averageBlockTime_description: Average time taken in seconds for a block to be included in the blockchain
stats_counter.completedTxns_description: Number of transactions with success status
stats_counter.totalAccounts_description: Number of EOAs that sent at least 1 transaction
stats_counter.totalAddresses_description: Number of addresses that participated in the blockchain
stats_counter.totalBlocks_description: Number of blocks over all time
stats_counter.totalNativeCoinTransfers_description: Number of transactions with the transfer of the ETH
stats_counter.totalTxns_description: All transactions including pending, dropped, replaced, failed transactions

tx_area.Unique_character_string_TxID_assigned_to: Unique character string (TxID) assigned to every verified transaction
tx_area.Current_transaction_state_Success_Failed: Current transaction state: Success, Failed (Error), or Pending (In Process)
tx_area.The_revert_reason_of_the_transaction: The revert reason of the transaction
tx_area.Date_time_of_transaction_inclusion_inclu: Date & time of transaction inclusion, including length of time for confirmation
tx_area.Address_external_or_contract_sending_the: Address (external or contract) sending the transaction
tx_area.Address_external_or_contract_receiving_t: Address (external or contract) receiving the transaction
tx_area.Value_sent_in_the_native_token_and_USD_i: Value sent in the native token (and USD) if applicable
tx_area.Price_per_unit_of_gas_specified_by_the_s: Price per unit of gas specified by the sender. Higher gas prices can prioritize transaction inclusion during times of high usage
tx_area.Actual_gas_amount_used_by_the_transactio: Actual gas amount used by the transaction
tx_area.Base_Fee_refers_to_the_network_Base_Fee_: Base Fee refers to the network Base Fee at the time of the block, while Max Fee & Max Priority Fee refer to the max amount a user is willing to pay for their tx & to give to the validator respectively
tx_area.Binary_data_included_with_the_transactio: Binary data included with the transaction. See logs tab for additional info
tx_area.Other_data_related_to_this_transaction: Other data related to this transaction
tx_area.Couldnt_find_any_token_transfer_that_mat: Couldn't find any token transfer that matches your query.
tx_area.There_are_no_internal_transactions_for_t: There are no internal transactions for this transaction.
tx_area.There_are_no_logs_for_this_transaction: There are no logs for this transaction.
tx_area.There_are_no_state_changes_for_this_tran: There are no state changes for this transaction.
tx_area.A_set_of_information_that_represents_the: A set of information that represents the current state is updated when a transaction takes place on the network. The below is a summary of those changes.
tx_area.Burnt_fees_hint2: burned for this transaction. Equals Block Base Fee per Gas * Gas Used
tx_area.Burnt_fees_hint3: + Blob Gas Price * Blob Gas Used

contract_verification_area.For_best_practices_all_contract_source_c: For best practices, all contract source code holders, publishers and authors are encouraged to also specify the accompanying license for their verified contract source code provided.
contract_verification_area.Currently_Blockscout_supports_contract_v: Currently, Blockscout supports %var1 contract verification methods

address_area.There_are_no_tokens_of_selected_type: There are no tokens of selected type.
address_area.Couldnt_find_any_token_that_matches_your: Couldn't find any token that matches your query.
address_area.There_are_no_internal_transactions_for_t: There are no internal transactions for this address.
address_area.Couldnt_find_any_transaction_that_matche: Couldn't find any transaction that matches your query.
address_area.Address_balance_in_ZCX_Doesnt_include_ER: Address balance in ZCX. Doesn't include ERC20, ERC721 and ERC1155 tokens
address_area.Creator: Creator
address_area.Implementation_address_of_the_proxy_cont: Implementation address of the proxy contract
address_area.All_tokens_in_the_account_and_total_valu: All tokens in the account and total value
address_area.Number_of_transactions_related_to_this_a: Number of transactions related to this address
address_area.Number_of_transfers_to_from_this_address: Number of transfers to/from this address
address_area.Number_of_blocks_validated_by_this_valid: Number of blocks validated by this validator
address_area.Block_number_in_which_the_address_was_up: Block number in which the address was updated
address_area.Successfully_added_token_to_your_wallet: Successfully added token to your wallet
address_area.There_are_no_validated_blocks_for_this_a: There are no validated blocks for this address.
address_area.The_name_found_in_the_source_code_of_the: The name found in the source code of the Contract

indicators.daily_txs_description: Number of transactions yesterday (0:00 - 23:59 UTC). The chart displays daily transactions for the past 30 days.
indicators.coin_price_description: ZCX token daily price in USD.
indicators.market_cap_description: The total market value of a cryptocurrency's circulating supply. It is analogous to the free-float capitalization in the stock market. Market Cap = Current Price x Circulating Supply.

gas_related.average_chart_description: Average gas price for the period (Gwei)

coin_balance_history.There_is_no_coin_balance_history_for_thi: There is no coin balance history for this address.

token_area.The_total_amount_of_tokens_issued: The total amount of tokens issued
token_area.Number_of_accounts_holding_the_token: Number of accounts holding the token
token_area.Number_of_transfer_for_the_token: Number of transfer for the token
token_area.Number_of_digits_that_come_after_the_dec: Number of digits that come after the decimal place when displaying token value

wallet_related.Your_wallet_is_used_to_interact_with_app: Your wallet is used to interact with apps and contracts in the explorer.
